titleStmt.title: A new ballad of King Edvard and Iane Shore. To the tune of, St. George for England [and] the dragon.
titleStmt.author: Butler, Samuel, 1612-1680.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Samuel Butler. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Verse: "Why should we boast of Lais and his knights?".
Imperfect: copy folded, affecting some text and title.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
